snippet.title: Ninza beta: Butterfly version out NOW! - Frantic platformer fighting game -
snippet.description:
Brace yourselves dear Ninzas, tonight the Mo0n will be waiting for you, draped in the shadows of its disturbing grin. Indeed, our dear celestial highness has unleashed upon us a new part of its big plan... A NEW VERSION OF THE GAME IS OUT NOW!

- Ninza is a mad and original  platformer fighting game like no other -
Push blocks to crush your friends! Pick 1 of our first 6 characters and defeat your friends in our crazy fast intense action game.
- Every character got their own moveset and skills
- Hyperattacks
- Trigger deadly chain reactions to trap your opponents
- Earn Mo0n favor and level up your ranks to unlock balloons
- And more to come!

Download and play the beta at http://www.ninza-game.com 
Join the community and give us your feedbacks:
Discord —  https://www.discord.gg/awR8MRx
Twitter — http://www.twitter.com/NinzaGame
Website — http://www.ninza-game.com/
Newsletter — https://mailchi.mp/8977e78b348c/ninzanews
